p: Certified industrial hemp ( Cannabis sativa L.) seeds were obtained from the Institute for Field and Vegetable Crops in Novi Sad, Serbia. Field experiments were set up at the Alternative Crops and Organic Production Department in Backi Petrovac, Serbia (N502138 E395689) using 13 different cultivars of industrial hemp ( Table 4), some of them included in the European List of Approved hemp varieties (cultivars) [ 35]. The cultivars used in this study included CS (Carmagnola Selezionata), Spic, Dioica, Helena, Carmagnola, Squieni, Bacalmas, Simba, Silesia, Chameleon, Fibrol, Futura, and Lovrin ( Table 4). The results from the first eight varieties were used in the statistical analyses and in the tables. In addition, new hemp breeding lines (named SK1 to SK8) were seeded adjacent to the above experiment and subjected to the same growth conditions.
